message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I believe you'd really appreciate. I'm asking for $110 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $110 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $90 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget. I can come down a bit. How about $95?  It's a good deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $95 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $85 for it.
